message.name: HTTP_404_VERIFICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified verification_id. Please use a valid verification_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_MISSING_PARAMETERS
message.locale: Missing case_id or person_id parameter. Please include a valid case_id or person_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_TOO_MANY_PARAMETERS
message.locale: Too many parameters. Please include either a valid case_id or person_id and try again.
